menuRateNow.description: Text of the rate now menu button.

menuRateLater.description: Text of the rate later menu button.

menuAnalysis.description: Text of the analysis menu button.

menuSearchEnabled.description: Text of the search button when search is turned on.

menuSearchDisabled.description: Text of the search button when search is turned off.

views.description: Text for the number of views

publishedSomeDaysAgo.description: Text for video published less than two weeks ago

publishedSomeWeeksAgo.description: Text for video published between 2 weeks ago and one month ago

publishedAMonthAgo.description: Text for video published one month ago

publishedSomeMonthsAgo.description: Text for video published more at least two month ago and less than 1 year ago

publishedAYearAgo.description: Text for video published 1 year ago

publishedSomeYearAgo.description: Text for video published more than 1 year ago

noCriteriaScore.message: Il n'y a pas de score de critère pour cette vidéo pour le moment.
noCriteriaScore.description: Message displayed when there is no criteria score for a video.

viewMore.Description: Text for the view more button inside the search recommandation container

study2023BannerText.message: Is the Tournesol project really effective? We are currently investigating the impact of our browser extension on the YouTube viewers' habits. Join our research study to help us improve Tournesol!
study2023BannerText.description: Invite the users to join the study.

study2023ActionButton.description: Text displayed by the main action button of the banner.
